overview:
Lindsay Grenawalt joined Google Ventures as a recruiter in 2011. Lindsay runs recruiting programs for our portfolio companies.

Prior to working at Google Ventures, Lindsay was a recruiter for the Google New York Engineering office. Lindsay has hired hundreds of world class engineers ranging from entry level to executives for Google offices across the US and Canada. She helped define recruiting strategy for the engineering teams and ran specialized programs geared towards recruiting diversity and specialized efforts for infrastructure, networking and structured data.

She was previously based in Mountain View, CA where she recruited for both user experience and engineering roles.

Lindsay holds a BA in Sociology and a minor in Education from the University of California, Berkeley.
